name: It`s Chicken!
description: It's Chiken! - is a hardcore 2D platformer with interesting animated graphics and interesting gameplay in which you will have to pass various difficult levels playing for a chicken. Your main task in this game is to collect chicken eggs. Each level has a certain number of eggs, collecting those opens the door to the hen's house and therefore you will be able to go to the next level. Be careful in the farm is a wide variety of traps, when they come in contact with which your hen will die. Think over each step and avoid traps and obstacles, then this game will not let you get bored. Ahead!
